Амбассадоры Гудсёрфинга - люди, которые: Goodsurfing Ambassadors are people who can't imagine their lives without travel and adventure, and are ready to share their experiences with the world. Seasoned volunteers and experienced travelers, passionate photographers and bloggers, project leaders, and experts in purposeful travel fully embrace the core principles of our community. Feel free to reach out to them on our website and ask questions!
Если вы также готовы нести идеи Гудсёрфи: If you are also ready to bring the ideas of Goodsurfing to people, you have a great opportunity to join the ranks of our Ambassadors!
